text: @realDonaldTrump You damn spineless, heartless, narcissistic and selfish SOB. It’s unconscionable to see the head of a state bragging about stock market vs. caring for the millions unemployed and thousands of deaths due to #coronavirus. .@PressSec .@GOP #TrumpGolfsYouDie #TrumpsJealousOfObama
